column3: “🚀..My AnyTime AllTime EveryTime Smoke..This AZ grow is Amazzzing!..I recently picked up a quarter of this from YHS and Oh Wow!..the pretty smokey green nugs taste as good as they look. The high?? Amazzzing!..a perfectly balanced that keeps me elevated and even..EUPHORIC Bliss! This Magical medicine Fights Fatigue throughout the day. Enjoyed in my Hooka water pipe, two bowls and I'm 🚀...Zaps the Chronic Pain and Ste...”

“Trying blue haze vs. blue dream...blue haze wins. You can function at work and be relaxed. Good for migraines. Great for afternoon or if your stressed in the morning. Definitely an underrated strain. Smooth smoke.”
“Blue Dream Haze" = Blue Dream x Haze: excellent clear-minded and energetic sativa!”"
“very nice head buzz to start off,but am engaged and focused.pain level is way down and can do moderate tasks.This is a high quality medicine for me(in my top five favorites).”

“Relax with Blue Haze.  I like to puff on this while I'm making dinner.  So relaxing.  I defy you not to smile!  Brings on a feeling of happiness that you should experience for yourself.  I'd buy it again and recommend it to your friends who might not have a lot of experience with cannabis.  They'll feel zero paranoia on this strain .....They will thank you and ask where you bought it..”
“This is a good mix of strains. This strain helps me defeat pain and irritability. I feel pleasant and can enjoy life.”

“💙..Our Summer Solstice Magic  Medicine! We toked a nice slow  doobie while the 🍓 Full Moon rose over the Red Rocks! Her Highness bathing Us in Haze so Blue, SUMMER  arrived & NO One Knew!...Oh,  Grandmother Moon🌙so bright, so High, your reddish Light upon Us this night...Protect, Heal & Guide us in difficult times, we're Mourning the Loss of 49 Precious lives..Lift Up our 💙s in Colors of Pride🌈We are All one Fam...”

“The high is very energetic. Tastes very sweet. Easy to focus and get things done. You'll look up and a few hours will be missing. Not good for falling asleep, because you pretty much just lay there and think about stuff.”
“New purchase, mid-morning, so I already had my coffee strain."  This was delivered and I tried it for my mid-morning snack.  More like dinner.  Sweet

column1: Hits like a freight train after 5 minutes.  Cannot say when I will feel like moving.  Totally couch locked!”"

column3: “This is, so far, my absolute favorite sativa strain. I haven't been lucky enough to try super silver haze yet, but until then this strain is my #1. Blue haze helps me focus, relieves stress, wakes me up, removes anxiety, helps my creative thinking process, everything good. I suffer from severe depression and anxiety but take a pill each day (40mg of Paxil once a day) that allows me to function. Blue Haze turns me int...”

“As someone who has not used cannabis in over 20 years, this has been my favorite strain so far after trying about 10 various others. For anxiety and stress, Blue Haze gives a nice, mellow feel of relaxation without the unfocused feeling I've had with other strains. Works well on reducing chronic muscle pain also. Liking this one - it's a keeper in my natural medicine cabinet.”

“Migraine pain mild; nausea 6-7 when I medicated round 1800 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner & enjoy a relaxing evening. Did not expect the head high to be sooo heavy. I guess I shoulda maybe expected that if this is a Blueberry cross. But, definitely got the job done & I slept great that night! Highly recommend f...”

“3.5/ 5

Enjoyed the high and looks, but didn't taste as I hoped. A little harsh in the glass water bong.”
“perfect strain for those who are fighting stomach pain/cramps. After a couple bong hits my stomach loosened up and I was able to annihilate the fridge 👍”

“Absolutely amazing. If you love Blue Dream then you will love this, it is in my opinion essentially the same thing. Extremely potent, focused sativa effects with a relaxing pain killing indica feel. I highly recommend.”

“blue haze is very sweet, and is a very light uplifting high. very nice haze, not good for pain so much though. definitly a daytime smoke, especially good for going out on walks and getting work done.”

“Fantastic Indica blend. was having problems with my seizure ticks and insomnia and got some Blue Haze and a couple of hits off the pipe and I had the most intense body high I have ever had my entire life. absolutely amazing experience. Don't plan on going anywhere because it's a couch lock for sure and I haven't had the munchies so bad from a smoke in my life(which was good because I have been losing alot of weight l...”

“Migraine pain mild; nausea 6-7 when I medicated round 1800 or so. Takes bout 5 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (absolute must for me). Body high allowed me to eat dinner & enjoy a relaxing evening. Did not expect the head high to be sooo heavy. I guess I shoulda maybe expected that if this is a Blueberry cross. But, definitely got the job done & I slept great that night! Highly recommend f...”
“perfect strain for those who are fighting stomach pain/cramps. After a couple bong hits my stomach loosened up and I was able to annihilate the fridge 👍”

“3.5/ 5

Enjoyed the high and looks, but didn't taste as I hoped. A little harsh in the glass water bong.”

“blue haze is very sweet, and is a very light uplifting high. very nice haze, not good for pain so much though. definitly a daytime smoke, especially good for going out on walks and getting work done.”

“Really good strain, smoke it at a party with my friends and it really surprised me. After smoking it I was really happy, smiling all the time and having a great time.
The flavor was good, and it felt really nice as it entered my lungs. So yeah, I recommend this strain, a must try, not in my top five tho (don't get me wrong, it's really good but still).”
“The taste is phenomenal. Taste so sweet makes you wanna just keep smoking. It gives you a full body uplifting high. Does give dry mouth after a few blunts/bowls but that's just a given”

“Background info: I picked up 7 grams of this stuff from Green Planet the other day, this batch in particular being a very deep purple sprawling with orange hairs in company too a thick forestry coating of beautiful glistening trichomes and containing 17.11 % THC with a 0.07 CBD content. (For only $5 a gram too!)



Effects: Being a patient of chronic back pain this strains gave me an amazing body tingle, would be the...”
“Great flavor. Didn't last as long as I like, but it was pleasant”

“This strain is awesome, i just got home from a crappy day at work, wound up stranded for 2 hours past my shift because I ran out of gas, my anxiety was through the roof. I had picked up a preroll of Blue Haze earlier today and decided to give it a go. I have a super high tolerance and havent always had the best luck finding ones that work for me, but this one did. I feel like I am rambling now but I also dont care. I...”

“Really good strain, smoke it at a party with my friends and it really surprised me. After smoking it I was really happy, smiling all the time and having a great time.
The flavor was good, and it felt really nice as it entered my lungs. So yeah, I recommend this strain, a must try, not in my top five tho (don't get me wrong, it's really good but still).”

“Background info: I picked up 7 grams of this stuff from Green Planet the other day, this batch in particular being a very deep purple sprawling with orange hairs in company too a thick forestry coating of beautiful glistening trichomes and containing 17.11 % THC with a 0.07 CBD content. (For only $5 a gram too!)



Effects: Being a patient of chronic back pain this strains gave me an amazing body tingle, would be the...”
“Average strain. Does the trick. Far better and worse strains out there. Great relaxing day high. Reliable”

“This strain provides an intense cerebral buzz that activates creativity and full cognition. This is a strain with both body and mind affects. However, the affects in the mind reign supreme. Slight, but manageable paranoia accompanies the high. I am definitely interested in trying the hybrid, Blue Haze, again in the future.”
“Its wow *~* realy nice weed from basel in switzerland”

“This is a pretty good strain. It has a nice mix of body and head high, definitely puts you in a good mood but didn't do much for my anxiety, personally. Best if smoked in a calm setting, and it's one of those where a little goes a long way. Smoke too much and you'll end up with a headache.”
“Smelled nice and tasted good, but didn't help me to feel happier and I became somewhat irritable. Probably wouldn't buy again, but I could see how fans of hybrids could be into it.”

“This is a pretty good strain. It has a nice mix of body and head high, definitely puts you in a good mood but didn't do much for my anxiety, personally. Best if smoked in a calm setting, and it's one of those where a little goes a long way. Smoke too much and you'll end up with a headache.”
“I think this strain is just below average, nothing special which was disappointing because they bud tender was pushing it for euphoria and pain relief. I hate wasting money on lame strains.”

“How can you go wrong mixing Thai offspring with Blueberry.
Blueberry is what I call a bacon strain  it makes everything better :)
It realyl comes thru here , reminds me of the old time great asian skunk pot with an oregon sweetness.
I loved how much of relaxed state it took me without zapping my brain. Prefect right after work flower, when you want to erase todays bleh! and get tonite's YAY! started. chased it with a...”

“This strain provides an intense cerebral buzz that activates creativity and full cognition. This is a strain with both body and mind affects. However, the affects in the mind reign supreme. Slight, but manageable paranoia accompanies the high. I am definitely interested in trying the hybrid, Blue Haze, again in the future.”
“Its wow *~* realy nice weed from basel in switzerland”

“Blue Dream 2.0. This is probably Azure Haze by DJ Short and his son. Silver Haze bay area clone only was hit by a male F4 Blueberry stretch indica, that is one generation closer to the P1 (parental line) of the  original Blueberry.”
“Look at previous review for this strain for this info.”
“Look at previous review for this strain for this info.”

“I rated this a 4 because it has a very good intense high that is euphoric , but this strain makes me cough..A LOT , at first I thought it was just me but when I smoked it in a circle it made everyone cough a lot, so good high but you're gonna earn it”
“I think this strain is just below average, nothing special which was disappointing because they bud tender was pushing it for euphoria and pain relief. I hate wasting money on lame strains.”
“Awesome stuff, just love it. I had, had a hard day at work and afterwards I used this to forget the WHOLE DAY!!! LOL Oh boy did it work.”

“This is a pretty good strain. It has a nice mix of body and head high, definitely puts you in a good mood but didn't do much for my anxiety, personally. Best if smoked in a calm setting, and it's one of those where a little goes a long way. Smoke too much and you'll end up with a headache.”
“Potent medicine. Great smell and taste to these flowers. However, it's smell and taste are hardly unique. Smoke expands in the lungs and will have even and experienced smoker coughing.”

“The bud was very similar to blue dream, but didn't have the strong candy like taste, had the same smell but a lighter version of it kinda like the taste very light also, but was kinda blueberry like.”

“Love Blue Haze for a nice body high.  It relaxes my muscles enough to crack my back, which is fantastic!!!  I really like to combine this with some Super Lemon Jack from Cannapassion for all-around relaxation.”

“Love Blue Haze for a nice body high.  It relaxes my muscles enough to crack my back, which is fantastic!!!  I really like to combine this with some Super Lemon Jack from Cannapassion for all-around relaxation.”

“I rated this a 4 because it has a very good intense high that is euphoric , but this strain makes me cough..A LOT , at first I thought it was just me but when I smoked it in a circle it made everyone cough a lot, so good high but you're gonna earn it”
“Awesome stuff, just love it. I had, had a hard day at work and afterwards I used this to forget the WHOLE DAY!!! LOL Oh boy did it work.”

“The bud was very similar to blue dream, but didn't have the strong candy like taste, had the same smell but a lighter version of it kinda like the taste very light also, but was kinda blueberry like.”
“Its wow *~* realy nice weed from basel in switzerland”

“This is very good for insomnia and cleaning out the fridge. Makes you very lazy but good for people who want to just chill. Couldn't really be active or creative while on it because all it made me feel like was eating and then sleeping afterwards. Great to relax with definitely.”
“This is truly the best of both worlds: a true blueberry fragrance and taste, with a indica body release that’s not too much; as well as a sativa energetic high.”

“I have had 9 spinal cord surgeries, as well as both hips. I live in chronic pain everyday. 

Blue Haze is an evenly split body and head strain. I have zero pain and a good buzz. Couldn’t be happier!”
“very enjoyable strain for the daytime. pair's well with a morning coffee. I just finished some and I feel happy and relaxed, but engaged too. makes me chatty af tho”

“This is very good for insomnia and cleaning out the fridge. Makes you very lazy but good for people who want to just chill. Couldn't really be active or creative while on it because all it made me feel like was eating and then sleeping afterwards. Great to relax with definitely.”

“this is the SUV of weed. good for chilling, good for a party and laughing your a$$ off. I've baked one pre-work and had a productive (for me) day. I think it tastes a little sweet/woody/nutty. like granola. All in all you can't go wrong.”

“This one is interesting... I love the flavor it is a good balance between the berry and earthy funk! It for me has proven to be a great wake n bake strain providing a mild euphoria with some easing of pain. creative and productive. recommended for a great anytime strain.”
“This is truly the best of both worlds: a true blueberry fragrance and taste, with a indica body release that’s not too much; as well as a sativa energetic high.”

“I have had 9 spinal cord surgeries, as well as both hips. I live in chronic pain everyday. 

Blue Haze is an evenly split body and head strain. I have zero pain and a good buzz. Couldn’t be happier!”
“I could go on and on about this strain impaticular. The smell, effects, and dense nugs make this something worth raving over. Slightly more hazy than Blue Dream.”

“I've been going through alot within the last few months so naturally i was seeking a medicine that would help cure depression without the long body high that an potent Indica has too offer. mental vs physical. yah know. This hybrid really is that plus some more. I enjoyed the Berry taste alot and the mental high lasted for a good amount of time. I was able to finish chores around the house this has been challenging"...”"
“a sweet mixed berry sent with a hint of earthy Ash and a touch of skunk. open bud structure, medium weight buds and heavily kief frosted”
“This is my go to strain. It gives me the nice euphoric high with lots of energy.”
“Good effects. Great for daytime. Taste was a little darker than expected. Overall good strain for stress, ect..”

“WOW! I could immediately taste the haze upon inhale and had an outstanding smell for sure! I love this strain!! Passed right out after smoking half a bowl, slept like a champ and woke up feeling wonderful!”

“One of my favs smoked a joint, and  found myself out side building a new greenhouse...lol  Has a great piney  smell and a nice earthy taste

I recommend  this as a great way to start the day”

“Flavor is really amazing. Fresh, sweet berry note with lavender or rosemary. Delicious. Clean, uplifting high that leaves me energetic but not frenzied or anxious. More please.

This continues to be my favorite. High Noon does an excellent job growing this strain, highly recommended.”
“Very uplifting not to heady”
“It’s really relaxing, fast working, doesn’t really creep on you, body and head high. Overall it’s a great strain especially for lightweights.”
“All time Favorite”
“This stuff made me jittery and paranoid.”
“why does this strain exist? Isn't this just blue dream?”
“The version I just got 4.15% thc, 15.15%cbd. Lovely little strain. Relaxed but focused feeling. Will try again.”
“LOVE. Wonderful clear headed creative high. One of my favorites thus far!”
“Beautiful strain with good overall benefits!”
“Lovely strain nice sweet smell dense buds great smoke for a spring Sunday afternoon”
“Great productive hi. Very cerebral. Slight paranoia if you don't smoke it and do something. Not a couch weed.”
“Great productive hi. Very cerebral. Slight paranoia if you don't smoke it and do something. Not a couch weed.”
“It's the danky dank.”
“I really liked the effects of this strain. I was in a great mood & it tasted amazing.”
“good strain, great for being active, like walking the dogs. slight headache though”
“Good for pain when you need to be able to function. For me, a calm, happy high with very little sedative effect. Can put up with dry mouth because it's the only negative side effect.”
“This stain helps with my pain a lot. I have a nice body high with a sense of calm. In addition it has increased my sex drive which was a wonderful and unexpected side-effects.”
“Crazy strain here heavy cerebral effect and on the other side the knock out hitter lmao”
“4.5 very beautiful looking strain, smells amazing, great hybrid”
“Reminded me of a fruity OG kush, Loved it”
“this is one ofmy favorites. super clear buzz, & nice body high.”
“Crazy strain here heavy cerebral effect and on the other side the knock out hitter lmao”
“Good Overall Strain. Good taste, mellow high that opens up your mind. 👌”
“Great high. Chill as fuck”
“High quality high, strong, would highly recommend.”
“4.5 very beautiful looking strain, smells amazing, great hybrid”
“also, really helps with pain.  ladies, believe me.”
“it's certainly not a bad strain. tends to make me a little dizzy but that's just me. feels more like an indica than a sativa to me. gives you a pretty enjoyable high.”

“My favorite as of now. Smoked some of this at the river and ended up feeling so good I walked across, fished, explored, and floated back to my spot! I haven't swam in a while due to my illness and pain so it was great. Very uplifting and made me feel so happy! Will pick up more here in AZ every time I find.”
“Crazy strain here heavy cerebral effect and on the other side the knock out hitter lmao”
“This made me nice and mellow chilled out and watched movies 🎥 lol”
“4.5 very beautiful looking strain, smells amazing, great hybrid”
“also, really helps with pain.  ladies, believe me.”
“This was great medicine from ECC in Anaheim, CA.  High THC levels, super turpy but also very sweet and berry tasting.  High was pretty good probably an 8/10 on high.”
“by far the best strain I've had at any dispensary.  From the taste to the potency, definitely top notch.”
“Just picked up the blue haze, has a very nice mellow charm too it, would pick it up again in certain situations, maybe in a crowd passing it around.”
“How is it good for stress but it makes you paranoid 😂”
“pretty good day time medicate and hw kinda thing. This strain does leave you the ability to think and do. If youre a Indica user wouldnt reccomend for pain wont have you feeling numb.”
“Love the taste and smell. Lasted quite a while too. Great for during the day like a hike or bike ride.”
“great head and body high. still felt like I was able to do things. not completely couch locked. made me extremely giggly and happy. extremely creative”
“Only minimal snacking. Definite head high, pretty mellow. Had initial sense of peace, then makes me sleepy.”
“This is a good daily strain. comfortably mild not over powering in anyway. Puts you in a good mood and you can still get stuff done throughout your day.”
“suggma D”
“I love the after taste”
“solid strain, really relieved my muscle tension and it had a good taste. i felt very social and ready to take on the day.”

“Smoked a half ounce of this over the summer, amazing strain, became a favorite after the first hit. Powerful high, good for doing just about anything. This is my favorite strain that comes from Blueberry.”

“Quite nice, but nothing to write home about. A comfortable, balanced high with nothing particularly distinctive about it. It would probably be great for first-time users as a comfortable, easy introduction to smoking!”
“Smooth smoke and last a few hours. But you definitely feel the Indica later in the buzz.”

“I had never tried this one before, but my favorite dispensary had a deal on an eighth of this for a very low price- and when it was between this one or an all-time favorite of mine (Sour Diesel), the bud tender convinced me to try this one. I'm happy she did. It's not overpowering and the effects don't last as long as I would like, but overall it is a pleasant high while it lasts. Not on my top 5 list, but I would tr...”
“Yea. I think it was good. I had to use a nice size bong but 👍”

“Bearing in mind that my goal in trying this was to ease pain, I would have to rate this as average. My brain function was elevated, and I was unusually calm, but in lieu of easing the pain, it actually drew my attention to the pain and I could think of little else. This would be better for something who suffers from anxiety or depression than for someone strictly medicating pain.”
“All you have to do with this amazing bud is pack a small bowl & your already feeling it , being relieved of all your stress & issues. Amazing is all I have to say.”
“nice lite buzz and continue with your day.”
“Just bought this from Emerald Palace and I am thrilled. Perfect blend of body, mind and emotional lift.”

“I had to smoke a lot of this to get high. My experience was a mixture of happy thoughts and being seriously hazed. I was walking, but when coming out of the haze I forgot where I was for a second. It felt like a spacey black out. After about 90 minutes I slept​ like a rock.”
“Its the perfect everyday strain. It still gets you pretty high (and ive been smoking a while now) and youre still functionable. Been a favorite of mine for a while now”

“Hit me right after my second hit. I usually have to smoke an entire bowl to get any effect. But not with Blue Haze. I misplaced it & happen to find it in a drawer like 14 months later and it still got me high after just 2 hits. Some good stuff👍

It made me euphoric, relaxed, and aroused. I was sensitive to all touch & had the longest orgasm in my life. I smoke it on special nights with my hubby.”
“It’s phenomenal cannabis, and I felt very good about everything for the first time in a while. Love that feel-good tune it’s playing!”

“An incredibly versatile strain. I was active, giggly, and outgoing. My imagination was running wild, with a nice venture outdoors leaving me staring at the clouds and appreciating my existence as a creative being. A smooth, tasty blend between head and body high, I felt funny all over. Dense, crystal coated bud, and delicious”

“Really head buzzy in Vaporite. Driest dry mouth I've ever had. A bit dizzying - puts me off balance. I have a slow laugh with the TV. I can't wait to read this later man! hahaha...

3 hours later: I'm so tired. I feel like I could fall asleep in the chair. Kind of annoying. Kind of stuck here.”

“Some god strain. After I smoke. I'm ready to conquer the world, clean my house & happy. But, when Blue Haze's time is up. I'm tired as hell. I don't like feeling like that after smoking. Other than that pretty good #SativaHybrid mix.”
“An okay smoke. Nothing to write home about. It's effects were pleasant, but relatively short lived and not particularly exciting or heavy in any direction”

“Blue haze is the polar opposite of what it name suggests. You are anything but blue or in a haze. This hybrid is a relaxing in the body high and provides a nice, euphoric head high. The flavor is very nice with a strong sage flavor but sweet at the same time. Good strain for the day when you want to medicate but have things to do as well.”

“one of the best strains i ever smoked 🍁 .. I was still high the next morning 
great strain .love the amount of THC”
“Very fuego. I felt a strong relaxation and oneness. Highly recommend.”
“flame the best very fruity”

“First time trying this one and  out off the 8 or so I've tried, I definitely like this one the best. Great all around lift. doesn't make you have super hunger like some others. Will be back for more of this for sure...”
“Blueberry, pine, earth, and musk combine to make a unique and pleasant-tasting bud. Nice, easy high.  You can still think pretty clearly, so this is a good morning-time strain.”

“On the first hit, the strain tasted kind of funky. It sort of  tasted like the smell of fresh, finely trimmed grass. By 10 mins in, I felt like I was finding myself emotionally and spiritually in the 3rd person perspective. 45 mins in, my computer monitors started to mesh together and I was seeing images of John Candy in my current session of The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim.

I felt more active while under the effects of...”
“Great way to medicate and function all day!”
“Very very good! Took my,pain away !”

“Very nice flower. It really needs to be smoked in a bong to appreciate the smell and taste. 
Two good bong hits can be enough to smoke daytime anymore and and its couch lock you. 
A strain perfect for groups.”
“feels like a hybrid yeah. good.”
“it's very tasty,and does the trick.”

“We found an 'OD variant of Blue Haze as an Indica/Sativa hybrid and are really enjoying it rolled in paper. We do a pretty good number of blunts and find it's a good level of THC to feel the effects without turning you into a vegetable. Mostly mental over physical
column4: this was a very light and mellow experience that I'm eager to make regular.”"

column3:
“I did not think it was gonna be this great!
the first hit I took made my head go back in harmony 
I need this Shit,”
“just not strong enough for me. maybe a bad batch. nice taste and smell. effects just don't last long at all. like they cancel each other out.”
“Absolutely amaazzzing. Smoked it while watching some nature shows and I was done for. Love the twinkly crystals and the mouth tingling first inhale is to die for.”
“This stuff made me jittery and paranoid.”
“I could go on and on about this strain impaticular. The smell, effects, and dense nugs make this something worth raving over. Slightly more hazy than Blue Dream.”
“Blue haze keef was a great choice 👍👍👍”
“Lovely strain nice sweet smell dense buds great smoke for a spring Sunday afternoon”
“All time Favorite”

“I have had 9 spinal cord surgeries, as well as both hips. I live in chronic pain everyday. 

Blue Haze is an evenly split body and head strain. I have zero pain and a good buzz. Couldn’t be happier!”
“Made me chatty and euphoric.”

“This is a good strain and a perfect hybrid. In lower doses it has more sativa like effects. In higher doses if feels like an indica. It tastes really good. It is very hairy, and has a lot of trichomes. This is a good strain that if you learn how to dose it properly, it can be a daytime or nighttime strain! Happy smoking!!!”
“lorem”
“Good for pain when you need to be able to function. For me, a calm, happy high with very little sedative effect. Can put up with dry mouth because it's the only negative side effect.”
“good strain, great for being active, like walking the dogs. slight headache though”
“It’s really relaxing, fast working, doesn’t really creep on you, body and head high. Overall it’s a great strain especially for lightweights.”
“This is truly the best of both worlds: a true blueberry fragrance and taste, with a indica body release that’s not too much; as well as a sativa energetic high.”

“This is very good for insomnia and cleaning out the fridge. Makes you very lazy but good for people who want to just chill. Couldn't really be active or creative while on it because all it made me feel like was eating and then sleeping afterwards. Great to relax with definitely.”

“TreeHouseCollective/GreenGopher got this bad girl and a very indica dominant phynotype too. Very chunky nugs with a very light pale green and lavender/ color and very large dark orange hairs.

No fruitiness on this one...more earthy/soil with a soft sour D/machine oil smell.

OMG THE SMOKE TASTES LIKE BLUEBERRY ! ! !
The only flavor you get from the exhale is a strong blue juicy berry: almost like you drank it before...”
“very nice.. haze looks blueberry taste. Very smooth, great cerebral effect.”
“Excellent for anxiety. Made me relaxed, but social. I was able to be myself. Made me talk all night, and want to listen to music or dance.”
“Well rounded strain with berry taste.”
“A happy and giggly flower! Very relaxed and helpful with pain! It's perfect after a long stressful day! Great smell too!”
“It's ok. You have to smoke a lot of it for effect.  But then you will really sleep”
“The taste just blows me away! Very nice effects too”
“me & my boiifrenn smoked it lastnight & we loved it made us so relaxed & gave us a good high 👍”
“also, really helps with pain.  ladies, believe me.”
“It's the danky dank.”
“Great productive hi. Very cerebral. Slight paranoia if you don't smoke it and do something. Not a couch weed.”
“Beautiful strain with good overall benefits!”
“LOVE. Wonderful clear headed creative high. One of my favorites thus far!”
“The version I just got 4.15% thc, 15.15%cbd. Lovely little strain. Relaxed but focused feeling. Will try again.”
“why does this strain exist? Isn't this just blue dream?”
“Very uplifting not to heady”

“Flavor is really amazing. Fresh, sweet berry note with lavender or rosemary. Delicious. Clean, uplifting high that leaves me energetic but not frenzied or anxious. More please.

This continues to be my favorite. High Noon does an excellent job growing this strain, highly recommended.”

“One of my favs smoked a joint, and  found myself out side building a new greenhouse...lol  Has a great piney  smell and a nice earthy taste

I recommend  this as a great way to start the day”

“WOW! I could immediately taste the haze upon inhale and had an outstanding smell for sure! I love this strain!! Passed right out after smoking half a bowl, slept like a champ and woke up feeling wonderful!”
“Good effects. Great for daytime. Taste was a little darker than expected. Overall good strain for stress, ect..”
“This is my go to strain. It gives me the nice euphoric high with lots of energy.”
“a sweet mixed berry sent with a hint of earthy Ash and a touch of skunk. open bud structure, medium weight buds and heavily kief frosted”

“I've been going through alot within the last few months so naturally i was seeking a medicine that would help cure depression without the long body high that an potent Indica has too offer. mental vs physical. yah know. This hybrid really is that plus some more. I enjoyed the Berry taste alot and the mental high lasted for a good amount of time. I was able to finish chores around the house this has been challenging"...”"

“This one is interesting... I love the flavor it is a good balance between the berry and earthy funk! It for me has proven to be a great wake n bake strain providing a mild euphoria with some easing of pain. creative and productive. recommended for a great anytime strain.”

“this is the SUV of weed. good for chilling, good for a party and laughing your a$$ off. I've baked one pre-work and had a productive (for me) day. I think it tastes a little sweet/woody/nutty. like granola. All in all you can't go wrong.”
“very enjoyable strain for the daytime. pair's well with a morning coffee. I just finished some and I feel happy and relaxed, but engaged too. makes me chatty af tho”

“I vaporized it, and honestly it's not my favorite combo of flavors, the sweet blueberry (which I don't think is dj shorts) mixed with that haze flavor is not good in my opinion. But smoking this out of a bong made me realize the potency so 3/5 seems fair.”
“Gives me sooo much energy!!”
“Good quality strain. Reliable.  Does the trick. Very good day type high. There's better and worse strains out there. 3 stars.”

“Bought an 8th on sale at my usual desp.--what a disappointment!

It don't cook, and it don't smoke worth a sh8t, no wonder it was on sale...maybe its damp cause it won't stay ligted and it isn't there" ; there is no there

column1: What a waste...gonna dry it out and give it another try. Pity I am on an extreme low income..wasted one half of my monthly allowance for this crap!”"

column3: “Absolutely amaazzzing. Smoked it while watching some nature shows and I was done for. Love the twinkly crystals and the mouth tingling first inhale is to die for.”
“this is exactly what I needed to control my emotional challenges. the high was gentle and clear headed. it lasted nearly all day.”
“very happy high! perfect for Saturday morning doing chores around the house and yard work.”
“Thoroughly enjoy taking a few puffs of this delicious strain. Be careful not to puff too much,because this can cause  a headrush".  #StayElevated 🍁🐲💚🌬”"

“Good strain overall, just a quick warning this strain from my view is a throat killer so go easy when you toke. both head and body high was very pleasant to feel both at the same time. only negative to report was it made me very sleepy even though its a sativa dom”
“This strain has a strong berry flavor and it smokes smooth”
“nice light high and continue with day.”
“stoney pain release bought for $6 a gram in my toronto dispensary”

“I smoke this before starting work. It's very uplifting and I feel energetic and can focus on my tasks.  It's very smooth, I'd buy this a bunch lol the buds are fluffy and light green with a lot of orange hairs. Has a sweet taste to it as well.”
“This strain made me feel relaxed and sleepy. Easy to zone out on this stuff.”

“This is a good solid strain I just like others more. Had some in the evening and felt super caffeinated. Texted like 20 friends a mile a minute for hours. Focused energy was the name of the game which I didn't expect. I still have a gram left but might never get around to vaping it...

I got around to vaping it to watch Jodorowsky's Holy Mountain. Very amazing experience - I saw so much more in the movie, drawing con...”

“Wow.this strain blew my mind.very cerebral effects.the sativa attributes shine through this hybrid.i am not much of a sativa fan but this strain really has something different to it.great rest as well.”
“Beautiful”

“This is genuinely the best weed i have ever had the chance of smoking in my life. This weed didn't dry out my mouth or eyes, it's the only shit that hasn't dried my mouth out to hell. And I am generally someone who gets very glossy and dead-eyed when I smoke, and my eyes remained generally fine aside from a little spacey. 
The affects of this weed were to die for. It's the sweetest, smoothest weed I've ever smoked an...”

“Blue Haze great ADL strain day stime strain.Intense Blueberry flavor with leg's of haze genetics.Picked up from in EL Mirage AZ. Flower was very impressive cured very well.
Use : Daytime for relief Headaches w/ cloudy weather and humidity combo-ed w/ Hashishans Lo Drops 5mg dose”
“I love it - great energy”
“Not bad, way better than most Blue Dreams that I've smoked. Beautiful bag appeal, great smell and flavor. Easy smoking day or night. Very similar to Blue Dream just a little better IMO.”
“Great smell that lingers from room to room. Used for motivation and creativity. The only side effect was dry mouth but nothing extreme.”
“It's amazing! That's all”
“I love it very pretty and taste amazing and great to handle I recommend it”
“Blue Haze (H) Bh is one of my favorite day time smokes.  Very nice Sativa dominant hybrid that tastes delicious. I would highly recommend to other patients.”
